column4: anyone here running 2.6.8.1-3-686 kernel with the nvidia module? I just installed it but it wont take the nvidia module, says it cant find it. I had it running on the 386 version of the kernel. I'm thinking there in lies my problem. SHould I uninstall the nvidia packages and install while running the 686 kernel?
you need linux-restricted-modules for the 686 kernel i believe
